name: Hitchcock Law Firm
tag_list: attorneys, lawyers, estate-planning, probate, trusts, real-estate, business-law
overview:
Experienced estate planning, probate, real estate, and business attorneys. For over 35 years, the lawyers at Hitchcock Law Firm have provided high quality legal services to individual and business clients in the areas of estate planning, wills, trusts, estate tax planning, powers of attorney, health care directives, probate and estate administration, will contests, residential and commercial real estate transactions, leases, property law, business formation including LLCs and corporations, sale and purchase of businesses, and sports law.

We provide the following services: Simple wills, Testamentary Trust Wills, Disclaimer Trust Wills, Revocable Living Trusts, Irrevocable Trusts, Estate Tax Planning, Powers of Attorney, Health Care Directives, Probate, Estate Administration, Will Contests, Trust Administration, Real Estate Law, Residential purchase agreements, Commercial purchase agreements, Leases, Property law, Life Estate Deeds, Transfer on Death Deeds, Business formation, LLCs, Corporations, Partnerships, Sale and purchase of businesses
